# [Interview #718: Alloy of Law Signing Report - FireArcadia, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=718#3)

#### Fire Arcadia

What is the definition of Investiture?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO. Investiture is off the table as far as questions go.
